text:
Crown Lands (Shack Sites) Order 1998

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment, make the following order under section 35 of the Crown Lands (Shack Sites) Act 1997 .

2 November 1998

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Crown Lands (Shack Sites) Order 1998 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Extension of conversion period
    The conversion period under the Crown Lands (Shack Sites) Act 1997 is extended until midnight on 19 November 1999.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 11 November 1998

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
